intro.title: Hello, I'm Lain-Ego
intro.desc:
MCU Development | Linux Development | Mechanical Drawing | PCB Design | ROS and Robot Simulation
Focus on Embedded Systems, Robot Control and Simulation.

item1.title: Portfolio-01 ROBOCON Legged Robot Competition: Quadruped Robot Full-Stack Development
item1.desc: Carbon tube assembly mechanism similar to plant protection drones + force control algorithm + 3D radar mapping and navigation technology.

item2.title: Portfolio-02 Bionic Boston Lobster Civil Submersible Robot
item2.desc: Integrated lower-level framework with stepper peristaltic pumps, motor/servo drivers, gyroscope data processing, and closed-loop control of 360-degree servos via reading IIC encoders.

item3.title: Portfolio-03 Intelligent Transplanting and Harvesting Robot
item3.desc: Completed functional debugging of modules including gripper lifting mechanism, omni-wheel chassis, and omni-directional positioning system by controlling DJI3508 motors.
